artist: Natori Shunsen; Published by Watanabe Shōzaburō
description: portrait of a male actor wearing a blue and white head wrap and a blue, red, white and black costume with gloves; grey ground
marks: 昭和廿九年一月作 {Shōwa nijūkyūnen ichigatsu saku} (made i 梶蔦齋春仙畫 {Bichōsai Shunsen ga} (picture by Bichōsai
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with mica and embossing
text: Twenty-first design of a set of thirty. Imagined portrait of the actor Ichikawa Sadanji III (1898-1969) as Azuma no Yoshirō in the kabuki play Modori kago iro ni aikata 戻駕色相肩 (A Harlot's Love in a Returning Palanquin).
title: The Actor Ichikawa Sadanji III as Yoshirō in 'Modori kago'
